page.title: 19FAMILY LIFE IN CHELTENHAM
page.content: Usually my family starts by getting up around 8 o'clock.They get dressed,have a wash and go down to breakfast which is usually bacon & egg or cereal like cornflakes.Then you clean your teeth. Now dad goes off to work and the children brush their hair and get ready for school.While they are at school mum dusts and hoovers the rooms or some mums go to work, in fact most mums do round where we live.Some children go home for dinner but most take sandwiches to school.Around half past three the children get home from school and they go and watch telly or play a game outside.When Dad comes home at 5 o'clock we get our tea over with and watch a bit of telly till 9 o'clock.Then us children go to bed and dad and mum have a peaceful evening.At 11.30 mum and dad go to bed and this is the usual pattern of our week.
